deprecation.reason: Because when this configuration property is used, there is case that custom language driver cannot be registered correctly.

properties.name: mycommand.lazy-initialization
properties.description: Set whether enable lazy initialization for mapper bean.

properties.name: mycommand.mapper-default-scope
properties.description: A default scope for mapper bean that scanned by auto-configure.

properties.name: mycommand.inject-sql-session-on-mapper-scan
properties.description: Set whether inject a SqlSessionTemplate or SqlSessionFactory bean (If you want to back to the behavior of 2.2.1 or before, specify false). If you use together with spring-native, should be set true.
